name: Tinkering Turrets (Demo)
description:
Created within a week, this demo serves to demo the core of the future release. The full release will contain tower customization methods, additional levels and enemy types, bosses, and more.

Demo contents:

  • One level
  • Endlessly scaling enemies
  • Enemy AI that adjusts to tower placement
  • Four unique towers
  • High-score saving

Controls:

  • WSAD/Arrow Keys: Move Camera
  • Click and drag tower icons on the sides to place towers
    • While dragging, press C or drag outside the map to cancel the placement
